writer.name: 达米亚诺·迪诺森佐 Damiano D'Innocenzo

introduction: Lead character, Guy Marks, is retiring from the police force. We follow his last day on the job patrolling with his partner, Mike. They respond to various situations of drug dealing, a school incident and arrests. We realize that Guy cannot adjust to his new life as a civilian and is compelled to continue patrolling with the belief that he is protecting others. He takes justice into his own hands with a dramatic conclusion.
